name: Mini-game Minisode
description:
Left click to open a tile

Right click to place a flag

Score and Time are added whenever you clear a meteor (1*bombs and 10*bombs on the map respectively)

To Quit the app use the red X button on the top right (left click it and in the quit menu click "yes")

High scores are saved on your local computer, more to come on custom pathing.

FUTURE:

-WireShock (Bioshock hacking minigame knock off)

-More custom pathing on save data

-Main menu

-CodeOut (Fallout hacking minigame knock off)

Known Issues:

-UI cuts into game space

-Save data results in error (fixed)
